Scene:
The Shipping Agent at Daimotsu
(Tokaiya daimotsu ura / 渡海屋大物浦)

Play: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees (義経千本桜)

Production: September 1991



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Chitosedayū (竹本千歳大夫)

Toyotake Rodayū V (豊竹呂大夫 (五))

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danji (竹沢団治)

Tsuruzawa Seitomo II (鶴澤清友 (二))

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)



Performers:
